title-part.text: MACHINES OR ACCESSORIES FOR MAKING, SETTING, OR DISTRIBUTING TYPE
Elements or appliances for hand composition

CPC-specific-text.text: for languages in which the latin alphabet is not used

title-part.text: Quadrats or quads: Spaces or other justifiers
Machines or other mechanical apparatus for composing
Apparatus for mechanical composition using prefabricated type, i.e. without casting equipment
Mechanical composing machines using single types or logotypes and having slide magazines therefor, e.g. flat, cylindrical, radial, single magazines
Devices for making type or lines

reference.text: for mechanical composition B41B7/00, B41B9/00, B41B11/00

title-part.text: for making type in the form of lines, e.g. by drawing or casting
Kinds or types of apparatus for mechanical composition in which the type is cast or moulded from matrices
operating with fixed combinations of matrices
for casting individual characters or spaces, e.g. type casting machines
for composing, justifying and casting complete lines of matrices, e.g. "monoline" machines
operating with separate matrices for individual characters or spaces which are selected and assembled
in which a line is composed of matrices and in which single types or spaces are cast, e.g. stringer type
in which a justified line is composed of matrices and a type line is cast in one piece
the matrices being composed by hand
the lines of matrices being composed and justified by machine operation, e.g. line type casting machines, "intertype" machines
the matrices being guided by wires, e.g. "typograph" machines
Details of, or accessories for, machines for mechanical composition using fixed combinations of matrices from which type is cast or moulded
Carriers for combinations of matrices, e.g. blocks, cylinders, wheels, bars
Mechanisms for effecting relative movements of matrix carriers and moulds for character or space selection
Devices for handling type after casting
Details of, or accessories for, machines for mechanical composition using matrices for individual characters which are selected and assembled for type casting or moulding
Storage devices for matrices or space bands
Escapements or guides for releasing space bands
Devices or arrangements for assembling matrices and space bands
Belt conveyers co-operating with assembler guides
Devices for feeding or guiding space bands into association with matrices
Star wheels or other stacking devices for matrices and space bands
Assembler elevators or associated mechanisms, e.g. braking devices, retaining pawls, line resistants, delivery slides
for presenting matrices or space bands directly to moulds
Devices for aligning or clamping lines of matrices and space bands
Moulding or casting devices or associated mechanisms
with a series of moulds and mechanism for selecting individual moulds
with provision for adjusting length or width of slot
for casting type-bars of special form, e.g. with projections

reference.text: melting pots for casting stereotype plates B41D3/20

title-part.text: movable towards and away from mould
with stirrers or means for removing dross
associated with mechanism for introducing metal in solid form
Arrangements or devices for distributing matrices or space bands after casting or moulding
Devices for cooling or cleaning matrices
Equipment specially adapted for photographing mounted characters or the like, e.g. advertisements, lines
the characters being composed or mounted by hand, and photographed simultaneously
by elastic or extensible type-line carriers
the characters being progressively photographed one by one
Photographic composing machines with movable character carriers for composing lines of characters prior to photography
with means for photographing complete lines
and with carriers for individual characters
and with carriers for complete sets of characters, e.g. slidable elongated members, rotary wheels
with means for photographing composed characters in succession
with a single character, or with combinations of different styles of a single character
with parts of characters for building up complex characters, e.g. oriental characters
Devices for handling or storing character carriers
Photographic composing machines having fixed or movable character carriers and without means for composing lines prior to photography
with manually-adjustable character carriers to enable characters to be photographed in succession
with a carrier for all characters in at least one fount
with means for moving the optical path for photographing characters, e.g. intermittently
with means for moving the film in its plane for photographing characters in succession
with a single character in more than one style
on a sheet of square or rectangular shape
with means for indicating the width
having electron-beam tubes producing an image of at least one character which is photographed
the characters appearing on the screen in succession
with combinations of characters appearing on the screen at the same time
and presenting a text of more than one line
Character carriers associated with electron-beam tubes
Common details of photographic composing machines of the kinds covered in groups B41B17/00 and B41B19/00
Devices associated therewith, e.g. control devices
with means for selecting individual optical paths

reference.text: means for moving the optical path B41B17/12
film-handling means in line-composing photographic devices B41B15/32; machines with means for moving the film in its plane for photographing characters in succession B41B17/16

title-part.text: for feeding films stepwise in line direction
for feeding films continuously in line direction
Auxiliary devices for modifying, mixing or correcting text or lay-out in connection with photographic or photoelectronic composing
for mixing by line-by-line projection of parts of texts from a number of films on to another
for facilitating hand correction of texts
for correcting texts by removing incorrect lines from one film and splicing-in corrected lines from another film
Marking record carriers used for controlling composing machines
Control, indicating, or safety devices or systems for composing machines of various kinds or types
Apparatus specially adapted for preparation of record carriers for controlling composing machines

reference.text: for casting individual characters or spaces, e.g. in type casting machines B41B7/04; methods for marking or reproducing record carriers having digital data thereon in general G06K1/00

title-part.text: incorporating devices for line justification, e.g. counting and indicating devices for length of line
comprising elements which circulate from and to magazines
using a binary code for the width of the matrices
for changing the fount of type
Control, indicating, or safety devices or systems for composing machines of various kinds or types
operable by input of recorded or stored information, e.g. on punched tapes
with direct control of all operations by input of recorded or stored information
from electromagnetic devices, e.g. memory matrices
with means for temporarily arresting input of recorded or stored information to introduce time delays
Control, indicating, or safety devices for individual operations or machine elements

reference.text: in devices for supplying molten metal B41B11/86, B41B11/88; for light sources B41B21/08

title-part.text: for arresting or varying speed of one operation in response to failure or variation in speed of another operation
without the use of space bands
for measuring length of composed lines
Printing mechanisms coupled to typographical composing machines
for controlling selection or shifting of matrix magazines
for controlling assembly of matrices and space bands
for controlling insertion of space bands
for deleting errors or inserting corrections

reference.text: means for cancelling or correcting errors in typewriters or selective printing mechanisms B41J29/26
